data.prayer: Please, teach the 17,400 believers in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, sanctify the 17,400 believers in Etawah and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Goley people might believe through him.
Spirit, cause the 17,400 believers in Etawah to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,564,400 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Etawah
location.people_groups_list: Mirdhas (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Rikhisur, Rajput Bhadauria, Kadera, Rajput Tonwar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mirdhas (Hindu traditions) (135,000), Brahmin Rikhisur (52,000), Rajput Bhadauria (256,000), Kadera (46,000), Rajput Tonwar (Hindu traditions) (452,000)
